entry.title: Scanforce Invisible Metal Detector Gloves
entry.summary:
Vendor: PROD360
Type: Security Alert Devices
Price: 399.00

Identify and locate hidden and concealed metal objects on people during routine and unplanned physical searches without physical contact.

  • Will detect a handgun, a knife or small metal object the size of a paper clip at distance of 4 to 5 cm
  • Discrete warning: during the search, a vibration discretely warns the wearer and not the person being checked.
  • Long autonomy - 3 weeks for detection*; Automatic switch to standby mode.
  • Palm & back made of cut resistant ZIRNIUM® weave technology for optimum protection from knives or or blades combined with enhanced comfort, dexterity and durability. 
  • Perfectly adapted to all security check and control applications (concerts, sporting and public events, detention facilities)
  • Sold in pairs (for Left and Right hand)

See also:

 Invisible Metal Detector Bracelet

 

 

We offer special discounts on our range of metal detector gloves and bracelets to law enforcement and correctional services officers, firefighters, paramedics, and emergency medical technicians. Contact us for more information and to receive your unique discount code to be used at Checkout

entry.title: Scanforce Invisible Metal Detector Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: PROD360
Type: Security Alert Devices
Price: 199.00

Identify and locate hidden and concealed metal objects on people during routine and unplanned physical searches without physical contact.

  • Will detect a handgun, a knife or small metal object the size of a paper clip at distance of 4 to 5 cm
  • Discrete warning: during the search, a vibration discretely warns the wearer and not the person being checked.
  • Long autonomy - 3 weeks for detection*; Automatic switch to standby mode.
  • Water resistant goatskin outer shell
  • Attaches quickly on hand or over other types of gloves
  • Perfectly adapted to all security check and control applications (concerts, sporting and public events, detention facilities)
  • Sold individually (for Left or Right hand)

entry.title: BlackTactil Cut Resistant Protective Glove
entry.summary:
Vendor: PROD360
Type: Accessories
Price: 12.50

  • Palm & back made of cut resistant ZIRNIUM® weave technology for optimum protection from sharp objects combined with enhanced comfort, dexterity and durability. 
  • Excellent cut resistance: Cut level 5 according to en388
  • Very high iso 13997 results for cut resistance : 32.9 n
  • Fine ergonomic knit glove: Very good dexterity
  • Hppe yarn for high performance cut resistance
  • Sold individually (fits Left and Right hand)

 

See also:

Invisible Metal Detector Gloves
